title: Remove duplicate party name display

requirements.text: Remove duplicate display of party names in the user interface where the same party name appears multiple times in a single view or component
acceptanceCriteria: Party names are displayed only once per logical grouping in all UI components
No visual duplication of party names occurs in lists, cards, or detail views
The change maintains clarity and does not reduce necessary information

constraints: Do not modify backend data structures or APIs
Preserve all existing functionality for party display and navigation
nonGoals: Changing the underlying data model for parties
Modifying party naming conventions or validation rules
